channel.title: Aaaaaaaaaaah someone is hacking my computer
channel.description: help me guys someone is hacking my windows 7 64 bit and they are doing it to try to steal my server luckely so far they havn't succeeded anyone help me do you have a program that can stop that?

item.title: Aaaaaaaaaaah someone is hacking my computer
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:400576”][quote author=emtrescue link=topic=497334.msg3636924#msg3636924 date=1308670842]
Pimpin bro i mean whoever is trying to hack hes computer, they leave a trace behind called a dns,
[/quote]do you have any idea what dns is[/quote]
Yeah I mean ::bandns is way way way more powerful than ::banip but pls say how to get one of those because i heard they were expensive because it’s more powerful and you can call isps to ban dns’s and cause hackers to fall to their doom from a dns

item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Pimpin bro i mean whoever is trying to hack hes computer, they leave a trace behind called a dns, its a number that only your provider can change, you can try to mask it but it wont work. he can call hes internet sservice they can find out what dns keeps trying to hack hes computer therefore the dns tells what internet provider they are using than he can call that internet provider give them the dns that is hacking him and the internet provider will either call the people’s house or call the cops, because hacking is againest the law

edit: it dont matter whatt age you are it is a federal crime whoever does or is trying to hack him even if they are underage will get in trouble. these little kids thinking they are goign to get away with things like this and think its funny, they dont reieaze they can change there IP adress all they want but that dns dont change
